articles.title: How to use chatbots for fact-checking, prompts to spot made-up answers - Business Insider
articles.description: Generative AI often makes things up. A writer breaks down the prompts he uses to detect inaccuracies quickly and still save time with chatbots.
articles.content: I'm someone who loathes busywork, so generative-AI chatbots have been something of a silver bullet for me. After initially dismissing them as glorified toys, I've been won over by their convenience.… [+4669 chars]
